article: a rebel leader who split with the tamil tiger guerrillas pulled his forces out because he believes the movement may be preparing to go back to war , the renegade leader 's spokesman said wednesday .
abstract: renegade group says main tamil tiger outfit may be preparing for war ; peace monitors halt patrols in east
